titles.title: To redesignate the dam located at mile 153.6 on the Rogue River in Jackson County, Oregon, and commonly known as the Lost Creek Dam Lake Project, as the "William L. Jess Dam and Intake Structure".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 7/23/1996--Introduced. Redesignates the Lost Creek Dam Lake Project in Jackson County, Oregon, as the William L. Jess Dam and Intake Structure.
